statements.select:
select a.I_IntId ,a.C_CarName ,a.C_PondSiteNo ,a.C_STARTTIME ,a.C_ENDTIME ,a.C_RESERVE1 from SM_POND_COMPLATETIME a where a.C_StartTime between #StartTime# and #EndTime#
a.C_CarName like '%$CarName$%'
a.C_PondSiteNo=#PondSiteNo#
order by a.I_IntId desc
select a.I_IntId ,a.C_CarName ,a.C_PondSiteNo ,a.C_STARTTIME ,a.C_ENDTIME ,a.C_RESERVE1 from SM_POND_COMPLATETIME a where C_ENDTIME is null order by a.I_IntId desc
statements.insert:
select SEQ_POND_COMPLATETIME.nextval as intId from dual
insert into SM_POND_COMPLATETIME ( I_IntId ,C_CarName ,C_PondSiteNo ,C_StartTime ,C_EndTime ,C_Reserve1 ) values (#intId#,#carName#,#pondSiteNo#,#startTime#,null,null)
statements.update: update SM_POND_COMPLATETIME set C_ENDTIME=#endTime# where C_CARNAME=#carName# and C_STARTTIME=#startTime#
